website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for consumers who need a six-piece set.
pros: Large mesh section lets you see what's inside
Lightweight, spacious, and available in four colors
cons: Material is not as waterproof as others we tested

customer_reviews.title: LOVED the idea of these cubes but the pulls fall ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVED the idea of these cubes but the pulls fall off and if both pulls fall off of the same packing cube you are going to have to have scissors to cut your clothes out and this would be HORRIBLE for traveling on the airlines since we all know we can't carry scissors on an airplane. Was excited about keeping product but not one but 2 have had this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: jamielovesbob

customer_reviews.title: These ones are great for longer trips for how much they can hold
customer_reviews.text: I'm a frequent traveler and I have many different brands of packing cubes. These ones are great for longer trips for how much they can hold. If your going away for two weeks or more I suggest that you buy these. You will be surprised by how much clothing you can fit( if you fold clothes properly) into these cubes. I am a guy so if you are a girl reading this please take that into consideration. Because guys tend to pack less stuff. But my girlfriend just got these too and almost fits all hear clothing and beauty supplies needed in them.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Love the organization!
customer_reviews.text: I used these on our vacation, and they were great! I just unpacked the suitcase, and when we arrived at our destination I put these on the shelf, and we picked our clothes out of them every day. Very easy to re-pack also. Highly recommend. 1 set worked well for me and my husband. I packed all of our clothes, and my shoes using all of the set. They open up all the way, which I really like. To pack them, just zip half way, and start loading up. I rolled all our clothes, and it held my pants, shorts, and tops, an all of my husbands shorts and tops.
customer_reviews.author: 2Okies

customer_reviews.title: Great for use when you're only using carry-on luggage
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world didn't I start using packing cubes sooner? If you travel frequently, they are incredibly useful. I think I got about 20% more into my suitcase because of them. They also make unpacking easier. I put all of my underwear in one, tops in another, and slacks in a third, and then just placed each unpacked cube into the dresser drawers upon arrival at my destination. So far these cubes have worked well. The large takes up about 80% of the floor of my roller bag, the medium takes up half of the bag's floor, and the small ones about a quarter. They were definitely worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Too many movies, too little time

customer_reviews.title: Great cubes - keeps everything in order
customer_reviews.text: My wife doesn't like to pack with these but I LOVE them. When I'm packing, I have all my stuff seperated which makes it really easy to unpack and shift things around if needed. I feel like my clothes are not all over the place during the trip and appears to keep the wrinkling down significantly. I would suggest these cubes for anyone who likes things organized and has trouble keeping clothes wrinkle free during trips.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck C

customer_reviews.title: Pack more efficiently!
customer_reviews.text: I had never even considered packing cubes until I saw they were a hot item on Amazon. Why would you need these? Great question! I began traveling with a backpack this year rather than a full-size carry on. This enabled me to ALWAYS keep my bag with me on the plane. I don't have to worry about overhead storage filling up or what order I board the plane because I can just put my bag beneath my seat. These packing cubes enable me to fit more clothing items into my backpack and keep them much more organized. These bags seem to be high quality and breathable. I like the double zipper so access is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Travelers
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by a friend, and I never travel now without them. They are especially helpful when you move from place to place almost every night. You can organize your clothing without packing and unpacking. You pull out the cube you need and everything else remains folded. Also works well on a cruise when you may only have shelves for storage. The cubes are ideal if you use a duffel bag. They are very compact, and make organizing your suitcase so easy! The quality is very good. I've used these on at least six extended trips so far and won't pack now without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I just took this on a 4 month vacay. Worth every penny. They are well made and I loved the options of multiple sizes. I actually bought two by accident not realizing I had kept the other one in my cart. This one ended up being my favorite out of the two. Would definitely recommend. I also liked the fact each one had a handle which made it easy to take to the beach etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna BTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: I just used these on a cross-country trip. The cubes are very good quality - I didn't have any problem with the zippers, even after 3,000 miles. This was the first time I had ever used packing cubes. I used the "rolling" method instead of folding my clothes. I was amazed at how much I could fit in my suitcase with these cubes. I should have bought them a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Vinylwoman

customer_reviews.title: So Organized and In Love
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They make organization while packing sooo easy and nice! They work great! You can have them set up in caregories so you can find the exact items you are looking for. I use these even when I am packing a duffle bag or backpack because you can fit a lot of stuff in each compartment and it makes your bag so much more organized! I can fit everything I need and more in these! They are a great purchase!! I recommend to anyone who wants to make their packing and traveling more organized and stress free while providing more space for more outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie NelsonTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but not sure packing cubes help that much
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and used them to pack my large suitcase for a 2 week trip to Italy. They seemed nice and held up well. They kept clothes and shoes organized and ensured they didn't "fly all around the suitcase" during travel. However, I did not find that using packing cubes in general allowed me to pack more or more efficiently. I actually felt I couldn't fit as much in my suitcase as I had in the past. Maybe I'm just a good packer. So, I rated them 3-stars only because I'm not sure how much they really help. The quality of the product and the quick shipping were more stars than that maybe 4.
customer_reviews.author: Boobuggie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose. I was able to fit many pieces of clothing into the cube. The cube is shapeless so i was able to roll the clothing up to fit more. Great for organization, each member of my family had one cube so I was able to fit 4 large cubes in one suitcase for a 4 day trip. Then give each person their cube at the hotel. Reduces the amount of luggage I would usually take. The only negative is the zipper handle should be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Packing and unpacking was the easiest ever and things come out beautifully. I recommend them to everyone who travels
customer_reviews.text: I went to Europe with these and was in 5 different hotels. Packing and unpacking was the easiest ever and things come out beautifully. I recommend them to everyone who travels. Love them and I got a set for my partner who is fussy and he loves them. I now use them in my guy bag, I roll up shorts shirt socks and etc. and just pull one out. On laundry day I roll up each set for the week and just back them in a cube and they come out looking great! I wouldn't take a long trip or any trip without them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Really great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken these all over Europe and the United States. I was skeptical and wondered what the appeal was for packing cubes. I love them so much that I bought my dad some. These are not cheaply made. The zippers are good, and they save a ton of room in my suitcase. I put, for example, shirts in one socks, in one, shirts, etc. These things are reallly great.
customer_reviews.author: marlena stone

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: These keep my luggage so organized and make it so my clothes just aren't loose in my suitcase. I can even use one for a few days' worth of clothes and put it in my backpack, for hassle-free weekend travel. I like that you get two of each size, and the price is very affordable. I bought these last year, and so far they have held up extremely well! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thereviewgal

customer_reviews.title: Better than I even thought they'd be...
customer_reviews.text: After thoroughly reading reviews of these and similar brands, as well as the concept of rolling my clothing, I was extremely pleased with the way this system works. On a recent trip to Europe, I found I could organize and pack more than I had expected. They were very handy for 'day trips' from our main location - bringing only what was necessary for the short term. I have used these on domestic trips as well and am well satisfied that I made a good decision to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Mary Rose

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I recently took a two week trip and could not find anything. I didn't know what was or was not still clean. People on our tour told me about these, so I ordered them after returning. We used them on a week long trip and things were just so much easier. Construction appears good and zippers work well. I used three and my husband used three. You could fit an amazingly amount of stuff in them--although I must say I still took too much. At least I could tell what was still clean when we returned!
customer_reviews.author: pcam1

customer_reviews.title: If you travel w/a suitcase - these are a must!
customer_reviews.text: these are so handy w/packing. I was a little skeptical but somehow they make packing for efficient. When you get to where you are going it also makes it so much easier to unpack but not have to pull out every individual item. The quality of these are great & I have used them multiple times in the past 6-8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two

customer_reviews.title: I am in love. I simply do not know how I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I am in love. I simply do not know how I have ever traveled without these packing cubes. I am addicted. If you travel and want a great way to get organized, remove only the items you need without tossing your entire packing on the floor, this is for you. I will never travel without these.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: How have I travelled without these?
customer_reviews.text: Love these “cubes”! They make packing and organizing so much easier, especially if traveling from place to place living out of a suitcase. When I first saw the sizes I was disappointed, thinking “these won’t fit anything!” I was amazed how much you could get into them (I will say the smallest size is a bit useless). I now have to get my husband his own set as he used half of mine on our last trip!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cube-tastic!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt at using packing cubes and I was surprised by just how much of a difference they make in managing space! This particular system is great because of the number of cubes you get for the price. We used one of each size in 19" carry-ons and found we had no trouble packing 4 days of bulky clothing for a winter trip to NYC. I liked how they allowed a different level of organization for the suitcase, instead of just cramming stuff wherever you could fit it in, then having a mess when it's time to unpack. The cubes were also great for packing dirty laundry for the return trip. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you're backpacking + good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought these. They helped me stay organized on my trip. I saw other travelers taking their entire bags apart to find one thing, but with packing cubes you have a good sense of where your belongings are.. then when you have to find something it's not a big production to take all the cubes out and put them back. None of my cubes broke or were torn. I think I will use them for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Terrific organizers
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought (and I really don't know why because there's nothing that would show it on the description) that the cubes were deeper than they actually are. Nevertheless, these are terrific organizers for my luggage and help me put everything in place. I am able to just pull these out of my suitcase, unzip them, fold back the cover, and place them in a drawer in the hotel or apartment I'm staying with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Belen

customer_reviews.title: Good for organizing, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: bought these after watching a packing tips video that claimed you could get more in a suitcase by using these. Not sure about that, but it was nice to organize our stuff in these things and plop the whole unit in a drawer. They seem okay quality wise - not "best ever" but also not cheap feeling either. all in all, glad to have them
customer_reviews.author: The Wild OliveTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: A must for any regular traveler
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! They help keep everything organized when traveling and are durable. They're great for long trips where you're trying to pack a lot in a small space and for short trips where you're trying to keep a duffel bag organized. My husband was a skeptic when I first bought these, but now he won't pack without them.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Recommending these to EVERYBODY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm to pack a huge duffel for extended travel. Had to shift items between bags at the airport in order to not go over weight limit and it was amazing! A few cubes into another bag and we were done! Well made. Nice blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Packing Cubes
customer_reviews.text: Great packing cubes! Multiple sizes worked well in combination with another set of same-sized cubes on a recent long trip. The cubes a sturdy, have good zippers, and have a good-sized mesh window that allows you to see the contents. We have used packing cubes on numerous short and longer trips over the last couple years, and LOVE how easy and organized they make packing. I love the purple color of these - helps me know which cubes are mine and which are my husbands.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Salyer Barton

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to travelers especially those who are constantly moving between ...
customer_reviews.text: Made backpacking so much easier! I was backpacking for six months and it made it so much easier to find what I needed and repack everything back into my bag. Would recommend to travelers especially those who are constantly moving between places.
customer_reviews.author: delaventura

customer_reviews.title: What a great value for six packages
customer_reviews.text: What a great value for six packages. I use to just fold clothes into my luggage but I was able to carry so much more by rolling them into these packages. The trick is to ROLL up your clothes instead of folding them. I was able to place four pairs of jeans into one of the bags and all my undergarments into the small bag. I also carry one or two of these bags on short trips to separate the dirty clothes from the clean clothes, or even additional pair of shoes, or loose items and accessories. Great price and for such conveniency!
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Life just got easier.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I would actually use these but have been thinking about buying them for a while. I have a two week trip to the UK planned and wanted to be more organized since I'm taking smaller bags. I've traveled with these three times now and I'm a total convert. They are strong with nice zippers. The fabric is thick enough to be sturdy but flexible around clothes. Also organizing by item means no more digging through the bags. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Minich

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed at how much more can be packed in a ...
customer_reviews.text: While these cubes don't have the durability of others I've seen, they worked well for the price. I am amazed at how much more can be packed in a suitcase with these! If you are packing a lot of clothes these work wonderful. Where they weren't as strong was for non clothing items. would have liked a little more strength in the side materials. All in all, a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Suit Cases Are Black Hole No More
customer_reviews.text: If you have issues organizing your suitcase before a trip the Rusoji Packing Cubes are an absolute must. The materials are strong, the zippers are pf high For the longest time I could never keep track of all my belongings in my suitcase, until I purchased these Packing Cubes. They are easy to store when you aren't traveling, because they all fit in the other without any problems. Organizing yourself and finding your beloved belongings in your suit case is a thing of the past.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for anyone who loves to travel or for those ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are incredible and really hold a lot. We use them for every trip but they are especially helpful when we are making multiple stops on our journey. We pack what we need at each stop in one cube by itself and it keeps us from having to dig through our bags to find what we want. Highly recommend for anyone who loves to travel or for those who enjoy great organization. If you are like me and really enjoy both of those things then you will definitely love these too!
customer_reviews.author: mythoughts

customer_reviews.title: I'm very organized so it makes sense that I would like these, my hubby is a bit of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan! Convinced my hubby too......he won't travel without them now. I'm very organized so it makes sense that I would like these, my hubby is a bit of a slob and he LOVES them because they keep him very organized. 7 countries in Israel and Europe this summer and this made getting settled, then packing up a breeze. They are made of a wonderful light but sturdy material and the top is mesh so you can see through them. LOVE THESE!! Might even buy them as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nylund

customer_reviews.title: Great deal & quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the purple color and it looks amazing. Crisp and rich purple like shown in the photo. The size of the cubes were of a great range from small to large. The material is of nice quality and the zipper functions very smoothly. It came packaged well too. Overall to me, the quality, the sizes, and the price you pay (I paid $30 rounded up) for 6 cubes is a great deal! Very satisfied with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My suitcase is so much neater!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I traveled without these! So much easier to organize my clothing and accessories with these cubes. Clothes don't shift around in my luggage and I can go straight to what I need without unpacking everything. They have held up well with usage also. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Travel Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: You don't realize you need these until you travel with them, that's when you wonder how you ever traveled without them! We have taken these to many different countries and they still look and feel like new. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. Coker

customer_reviews.title: Best travel invention ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 3-week trip to Asia and split it with my teenage son. It was the best travel-related purchase I ever made. The cubes are well-made and they kept our suitcases organized. You can pack a good amount of clothes by rolling them. Packing the clothes by category made it so much easier to get dress. It was a lifesaver, especially with a teenager who has no sense of organization. It definitely eliminated the "Mom, where's my...?" so I could enjoy our vacation and stress less.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Lane

customer_reviews.title: Where have they been all my life?!?
customer_reviews.text: Packing cubes are genius! I can fit so much more in by using these. These are soft with no hard edging. I think this may be best since they can squish in and fit as needed. Using these I fit 5 days clothes for my husband and I in a Vera Bradley weekender bag. What's best is you can pull out things as needed. You can pack an outfit in each cube. Or pack shirts in one pants in another etc. I will never travel without them again. They obviously save space but best of all my stuff remains tidy and organized.
customer_reviews.author: CALI L CHRIST

customer_reviews.title: I really like the idea of these
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of these, but they have a weird smell and the inside must have black fuzz all over because my clothing comes out of these covered in fuzz. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Inside film flaked off all over clothes
customer_reviews.text: Went to go use my travel bags, and they were disgusting inside, with a weird plastic coating that flakes off on the clothes I had stored inside of them. They’ve never had liquids in them—only clothes. I loved them until now. (7 months of use and now trash)
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: ... a short trip recently and they worked out really nice. I used a backpack and it was nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I used a couple of these for a short trip recently and they worked out really nice. I used a backpack and it was nice to be able to put like articles in them and just keeping everything together. All I needed to do was take out the bag and not have to pull stuff out that I didn't need. I definitely like them and will use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizers
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for me as it kept my suitcase in order the whole 11 day trip. Without these, in the past, I pick through my clothes until they are one ball of mess. This one could find pants, shirts, and underwear without a hassle. My suitcase always looked neat. I will use these always whether the trip is short or long. I am so glad to have found these on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize packing for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help pack for a trip to Europe. Like others have said, I don't know why I hadn't bought them long ago. I packed shirts in one large bag, pants in another, socks in one of the smaller bags and underwear in another. It sure makes packing and unpacking quick and easy. The bags are good quality and the zippers are sturdy. I have six business trips coming up this year and look forward to using these bags then.
customer_reviews.author: DougMac

customer_reviews.title: How can you pack without cubes?!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE packing cubes. Bought them for an overseas trip and have used them several times since then for shorter trips and even just for organizing. They are really great and these come in varying sizes and a very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bird

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These packs are great, made our month of travelling an absolute pleasure. The packs didn't tear and the zips didn't break. The sizes provided are sufficient to cater for whatever we needed to pack. I bought two of them in different colours to differentiate my wife's stuff from my own and it made our lives allot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them again! These are very useful for traveling especially as a family. Each member has their own bag packed so we no longer have to dig around the suitcase to find an item! Helps to pack and unpack in the hotel room and stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVENTION EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever for packing! This makes it so easy to keep a suitcase organized. I’m so impressed by my newfound ability! I never knew it was so easy and actually possibly to stay organized living out of a suitcase for a week! Wow!!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Organized and Efficient Packing
customer_reviews.text: My husband was not impressed when I ordered, but after our first trip using these he is sold! Having items organized was amazing. Unloading a suitcase and not having things fall all over and be a mess was a first! We recently had an international flight requiring an overnight layover. Packed everything we would need for the overnight in a cube and we we able to leave everything else undisturbed. We have gotten more organized with each trip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I would definitely recommend purchasing these cubes. I used these when I backpacked through Europe of 16 days. It made packing so easy and provided me with more space in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for packing.
customer_reviews.text: I saw a similar item in an ad and bought these. I was hoping to be able to organize my items when packing. I must say that they are better than I imagined! They allow me to get more in my luggage. The quality is excellent and they were reasonably priced. I love having 3 sizes as well. Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Right quantity and sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for over six months. I travel a lot. No complaints. Holding up very well. Two sizes of each small, medium and large are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: ASA

customer_reviews.title: ... items you can fit in these packing cubes is amazing. We don't travel anymore without them
customer_reviews.text: The number of clothing items you can fit in these packing cubes is amazing. We don't travel anymore without them. I've purchase a set for my son and his friend. My husband and I went in a want on a 8-day cruise with one medium suitcase for both of us using these packing cubes. They are wonderful. Just ordered another set for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Williams

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionary!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These changes the way I pack. I put items( outfits, underwear, pajamas) in individual cubes, take out what I need for the day, zip up and put back into suitcase. No need to unpack suitcase or rummage through for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Barbi Roddam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These are good. The zippers held just fine. They don't save space if you are trying to really pack your suitcase full using every amount of free space you can. For a casual trip they would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Packing cubes made my travel so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these packing cubes. My clothes stayed nice and were organized. This was a road trip so I was able to pack cubes to be pulled out for my stops along the way and drag all of my luggage into the hotel for the night. My next trip will be flying and know I will be able to pack more organized and my things will arrive ready to to
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Leaves plenty of room for your carry on
customer_reviews.text: Used these packing cubes on a recent trip and they saved a lot of room in my carry on luggage. I couldn't believe all the room I had left in my bag after rolling my clothes into the packing cubes. Came in handy to separate bottoms, tops, and underclothes in all three different sizes. The material is great quality and has breathable mesh. Once unpacked, it was easy to roll up my dirty clothes to keep them sorted from the clean. Try it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Raerios

customer_reviews.title: Love my Cubes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 years ago. At first, they looked small and I didn't see the point. However, they have help me to be so organized. They hold more than seem possible. I wouldn't travel without them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... share a suitcase and this has made it so easy to find what we need when we travel
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of these packing cubes - with two kids we always share a suitcase and this has made it so easy to find what we need when we travel. Each kid gets their own, or we group by clothing type, etc. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: one.29

customer_reviews.title: These packing cubes were a luggage saver for a 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes were a luggage saver for a 15 day trip. They really do keep your clothes organized, neat and wrinkle-free. They also allow for a lot more clothes to be packed into a suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: KPaulie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Wish we could purchase additional small ones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Wish we could purchase additional small ones. Found the largest one was not useful. Very good quality & enough size options for whatever packing needs you have.
customer_reviews.author: T Mac

customer_reviews.title: I love these packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: I love these packing cubes. 6 was more than enough for me. It made packing everything for travel very easy. I didn't have to dig through my luggage looking for what I need and making a mess at the same time. I would recommend it for anyone who is planning on traveling for a few weeks. It's also good just to use as storage in the bathroom or bedroom for miscellaneous items when you are not traveling.
customer_reviews.author: YvonneX88

customer_reviews.title: These packing cubes are so great and help keep the suitcase organized
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are so great and help keep the suitcase organized. The small sizes fits my shoes and the big sizes allows me to pack similar things or outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Way to Organize Your Packing!
customer_reviews.text: As a constant business traveler, I am always looking for ways to simplify packing. These cubes are the best! The 6 piece set has 3 different sizes to accommodate different sized clothing and the two zippers make it easy to pack and unpack. I place tops, trousers, undergarments, and accessories in separate cubes within my suitcase, when I get to the hotel I just place the cubes in the drawers and easily find everything! It also eliminates the ickiness of placing one's clothing in direct contact with hotel room drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality product!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I had a few of these I had purchased from LLBean years ago - these are comparable and much less expensive. I wasn't sure if this was too many ....but I used every single one of them on a 1 week trip.
customer_reviews.author: JHarper

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Handy. We travel a lot. Cubes are perfect for makeup, pills, socks and underwear. Just take out of suitcase put whole cube in drawer. Unpacking done. Works for slacks and blouses to keep them separated. Or can pack whole outfits together.
customer_reviews.author: silly gma

customer_reviews.title: ... I was able to find on Amazon for a great price and even better shipping
customer_reviews.text: Thankful that I was able to find on Amazon for a great price and even better shipping. Arrived in perfect condition and did exactly what I needed it to. Great purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they become great dirty closes holders
customer_reviews.text: very handy! pack your cube and unpack your cube by placing in drawers at destination! couldn't be easier and you can cram a lot into them. as they empty, they become great dirty closes holders!
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: Larger cubes than other sets...
customer_reviews.text: Cubes were larger than I expected--should've paid better attention to the description. I purchased another set to get smaller sizes. These sizes are large for carryon luggage. They work great as organization though.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Innovative Packing Solution
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are a new product idea to me. I am amazed at how many items each size holds. In the large cube I fit 2 pr regular jeans, 1 pr slacks and 5 pr of capri pants, all rolled and fitting nicely. I am very happy to see my suitcase contents organized within these cubes. Constructed well, with mesh fronts for breathing and handles for lifting out. Thank you Rusoji. I am very pleased with your product design.
customer_reviews.author: Living A Good Life

customer_reviews.title: Great for regular traveler !!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a Business traveler and well versed in packing and unpacking over and over. These are a great little item to keep things organized and TSA even can't screw up her bags that bad now... Well, not as bad. Makes easy organization. Only thing I would worry about a small amount is the durability of the containers after months of very high usage. Other than that concern... Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Andy Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: We love these cubes so much I bought an extra set
customer_reviews.text: We love these cubes so much I bought an extra set. If you travel with any frequency you will appreciate what a pack of cubes can do for your suitcase! Great way to stay organized, especially traveling with kids. These are soft and flexible and fit in a very small space when not in use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: some higher end packing cubes might hold the shape better, but for what I paid I think these ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the deal or the prices. Yes, some higher end packing cubes might hold the shape better, but for what I paid I think these are awesome. They really made packing and organization much more simple for me. In the hotel rooms, I kept these in the drawers to hold socks, undies and things like that. My aunt bought the more expensive Dot and Dot brand and these were perfectly fine for my husband and I.
customer_reviews.author: kjw2014

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my lifestyle and packing style
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are THEE truth! These are perfect for my lifestyle and packing style. I pack up 3 people for most trips and this is the perfect sized cubes to separate the clothes! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenyetta

customer_reviews.title: Love this packing system
customer_reviews.text: I am on the road for extended periods of time and these containers are a great way to organize the contents of my suitcase. I use two of the smaller ones for everyday use items: one for cosmetics, one for haircare and oral care products. The medium ones contain underwear and the largest are for tops and leggings.
customer_reviews.author: JR Weymouth

customer_reviews.title: They are great to organize your clothes
customer_reviews.text: These are INCREDIBLE! I recently took them on 3 trips and on each one everyone was asking me where I got them. They are great to organize your clothes, but also to cary makeup, electronics, etc. And they fit a lot (on a 1-week trip, they fit all the clothes for my boyfriend and myself, and we reaaaally overpacked).
customer_reviews.author: Pacheeks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a short time but they've already proven to be very useful for traveling. They help me stay organized and to pack everything I need into my small carry on bag. They are well made and washed well after my trip. I would recommend that everyone get packing cubes. They are the best thing you never knew you needed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love these cubes!
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are great and made packing so much easier. Plus my suitcase stayed more organized when I was on vacation and my clothes weren't thrown all over the room in a search of a particular item. They were a great deal for a set of 6 and I love the color! I like that the mesh on top is pretty big so you can easily see what's inside. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Donit buy these and expect to use them right away ...
customer_reviews.text: Donit buy these and expect to use them right away. It took several days to air them out. They had a distinct odor.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Used for Month-Long Europe Trip
customer_reviews.text: Packing Cubes are an amazing invention in general. They keep your packing so organized and I needed that for my month-long trip. My clothes were organized and kept contained to make room for souvenirs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Wish I had found these a long time ago. They really helped me get and stay organized!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I packed before...
customer_reviews.text: Love these packing cubes. I ordered two sets. Went on vacation for 2 weeks and had to switch hotels. It was so easy to just put the tubes back in the suitcase and relocated to new room. Also keep the drawers organized and made it easy to find what I needed. Used one for each type of clothing:socks, undies, jeans, t-shirts, swimwear, pjs, etc. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Evans

customer_reviews.title: mesh top allows you to see inside easily. would recommend for any traveller
customer_reviews.text: husband used these in his luggage. helped to keep all of his clothes organized during a long vacation (2.5 weeks). one large bag fit about 10-15 shirts (all rolled up)! mesh top allows you to see inside easily. would recommend for any traveller!
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: These packing cubes are dead useful. They are sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are dead useful. They are sturdy and useful. I was helping my mom pack for a trip overseas, and these came in extremely handy. There are different sizes, so I was able to sort her clothes and other necessities. She found it very useful, too. She said it was so easy to find things.
customer_reviews.author: M. Joshi

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boss birthday. He loves it. Bought a set for myself. I love it. Calms my need for keeping things in place. Love the mesh on top so you can see whats inside. I will more than likely buy more to give for my friends who love to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G.

customer_reviews.title: These are very useful, not just for packing
customer_reviews.text: These are very useful, not just for packing! In fact, I've used them for storing fragile items like sheer curtains or expensive baby outfits. Very cool product!
customer_reviews.author: Delete

customer_reviews.title: makes packing easy
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the first time during a two week trip to Italy where were constantly on the go and switching hotels ever couple of nights. Made packing and finding stuff in my suitcase a dream. I'll never travel again without them. I highly recommend these for anyone packing for an extended trip.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good packing cubes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of cubes you get for the price. They serve their purpose; however, I'm deducting one star because a zipper pull broke on first use trying to zip up a full cube. The zippers could be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great for keeping organized while travelling
customer_reviews.text: Is as expected and handy for organizing checked or carry-on bags. Purchased this as a complementary set to my current one. It is great for keeping organized while travelling.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love the color! They arrived quickly and the package was in excellent shape. Received 2 large, 2 med, 2 small packing cubes as listed on Amazon. All seams intact and zippers in working order. They are going to make life a lot easier while traveling. I am excited to begin packing!
customer_reviews.author: Esadora

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product makes packing easier
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with these packing cubes. The purple color is super fun. I really love the two smaller sizes but haven't made much use of the bigger two packing cubes. The price is really good compared to what else is out there. Overall I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luci Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: Great, useful product!
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes have been great. We have used them at least 3 times just since Christmas. The cubes hold more items than it seems and I love how it helps with organizing individual family members clothing as well as being able to isolate certain items together such as swim wear, sleepwear, etc. Quality seems good and I would recommend this product. I actually want to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: BrettM

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have 6 pieces of varying size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need for my upcoming trip. I am going to Africa and have to pack in a duffle so this will keep things organized. I need organization big time.
customer_reviews.author: Bootsie

customer_reviews.title: These were a perfect buy for a recent trip
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect buy for a recent trip. If you use them right, it’s amazing what you can fit in a suitcase. These hold their shape and the mesh venting helped with any odors.
customer_reviews.author: K. Amy Kaltman

customer_reviews.title: Great for germ phobic over packers
customer_reviews.text: Someone suggested I try these. I was skeptical at best. I am completely won over. Not only can you pack a lot into less space but once you get to your destination you can leave your clothes in these and use the dresser drawers without worrying what was in the drawer before you. (yes I am touch germ phobic). Upon returning home I washed them. They are ready for the next vacation. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Excited!
customer_reviews.text: These are some cool cubes. Glad I did my research. You get six sturdy cubes at a great price, what more can you ask for???
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Leggs

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: These cubs are great for travel to separate your items and pack neatly. They help make so much more room in the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: dynomite

customer_reviews.title: Love these packing cubes.
customer_reviews.text: I use them in my pull case as well as by their selves when using in my RV. They work well to organize my clothing for travel.
customer_reviews.author: William E White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for packing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for packing. Wish the set had more small/medium cubes. The large cubes are quite big, ok if using a larger suitcase, but we were trying to use with backpacks and small roller suitcases. Quality of cubes was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: trampusln

customer_reviews.title: Looks deceivingly small, But fits everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, looks small and looks like it won't fit much but it does! Say goodbye to over packing, these little compartments lets you organize your clothes quickly. Easy to find your stuff In Your luggage.
customer_reviews.author: GearUpBaby
